PackageLicense.name: PackageLicense
PackageLicense.description: Represents a license for an installed managed package.

AllowedLicenses.description: The number of users allowed to use the package.

ExpirationDate.description: The date and time when the package license expires.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace prefix associated with the package.

Status.description: The status of the license. Possible values are: Active, Expired, Free, and Trial.

UsedLicenses.description: The number of users who have a license to the package.
